title: x/mobile/audio/al: missing alcDestroyContext
body:
Open ALC bindings are missing alcDestroyContext, see http://www.opensource.apple.com/source/OpenAL/OpenAL-48.7/Source/OpenAL/al/alc.h for reference.

``` c

ALC_API void            ALC_APIENTRY alcDestroyContext( ALCcontext *context );

```
